item.title: Exploring the subway data from Toronto
item.description: Just sharing a EDA that I made for fun.

item.title: What is the oldest property in Montreal?
item.description: Something exciting about the real estate data in Canada is that most of the websites give the year built of each property, and through this, we will see where the oldest part of Montreal is. Is the old port really old?

item.title: Let's take a walk in Montreal
item.description: An exploration of the best places to walk in Montreal according to the walkscore.com. We find 11 neighbourhoods with a walkscore average greater than 60, which means good places for those looking for mobility.
